meaning_str.bing:
v. 建议；表明；推荐；暗示
网络. 提议；提出；启发

建议；提议；暗示；表明；使认为；引起；使人想起；使想到；推荐；举荐；使人联想到；启发；暗指；间接提出

1.en: I am not trying to suggest that we should forget about climate change. It looks likely to put our children in a difficult situation.
1.cn: 我不是要说应该把气候变化抛在脑后，因为气候问题似乎很可能让我们的子孙处于不利境地。

2.en: In fact, it sounds as if he is being quite reasonable in offering you something else part time - which I suggest you take like a shot.
2.cn: 实际上，他给你提供了一些其它兼职工作，这听上去很通情达理，我建议你立即接受。

3.en: So I suggest you do not breast-feeding within a week, but also in the case of his body carefully washed several times more than their hair.
3.cn: 因此，我建议您不要哺乳喂养一个星期之内，而且在他的身体情况仔细洗净比头发多几倍。

0.en: I suggest that you go back home.

1.en: This is very reckless. Well, what would you suggest?
1.cn: 这样非常冒险。那您有什么建议？

2.en: Then I suggest you make my alias somebody worth kidnapping.
2.cn: 那我建议你给我编造一个值得绑架的身份。

3.en: They have been all along. I suggest you open one up.
3.cn: 它们一直都在，我建议你打开一个看看。

4.en: Well, then I suggest you trust me for the sake of the cats.
4.cn: 那我建议你相信我，看在猫的份上。

5.en: I suggest you release whatever you have slowly. One at a time.
5.cn: 我建议你们慢慢抖出手上的料。一次一条。

6.en: I have fired up my resume as I suggest that all of you do, as well.
6.cn: 我把自己的履历烧掉了，我同样建议你们也这样做

7.en: I suggest you open your eyes to the possibility as your father would.
7.cn: 我建议你睁大眼睛看清一切，可能正如你父亲所做。

8.en: I'd suggest that we go away, you and me, on an extended trip to somewhere.
8.cn: 我建议我们远走高飞，我们随便去哪长期旅行。

9.en: Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little less E.?
9.cn: 容我建议你多看一点ESPN体育台，少看一点娱乐节日。

10.en: Now, if this experiment is going to be valid, I suggest a neutral environment.
10.cn: 如果要让这个实验有效，我建议我跟她得住在中立环境。

11.en: Your Honor, may I suggest... That Mr. Fornum be preserved as a rebuttal witness?
11.cn: 法官大人，我建议... 让佛努姆先生作为反驳证人?

12.en: Oblivion's inevitable. And if that scares you, then I suggest you ignore it.
12.cn: 遗忘是不可避免的。如果遗忘让你害怕，那我建议你忽略它。

13.en: They only work for you if you keep your job. I suggest you answer their questions.
13.cn: 你能保住工作，他们才是你的属下。我建议你回答他们的问题。

14.en: It will. So I suggest you keep the Vorpal sword on hand when the Frabjous Day arrives.
14.cn: 你会的，我建议，当辉煌之日来临时，你手上要留着斩首剑。

15.en: But, I suggest we don't mention it again. Now, if you'll excuse me, it's time to go down.
15.cn: 但我建议我们不再提起这事，如果你不介意，我该下去了。

16.en: You have a slight epidermal abrasion on your forearm. I suggest an anti-bacteria spray.
16.cn: 你的小臂有轻微的上皮组织擦伤，我建议进行除菌喷雾处理。

17.en: And if I may suggest, consider changing disciplines. Yeah, to the humanities perhaps history.
17.cn: 而且我建议你考虑教别的学科，比如人文学科，就像历史。

18.en: Get your house in order, Bernard. And if there is a problem, I strongly suggest you tell me.
18.cn: 管好你的部门，伯纳德，如果有问题，我强烈建议你告诉我。

19.en: Maybe in my twenties, not anymore. Okay. Well, assuming you're right, what would you suggest I do?
19.cn: 二十几岁时可能信过，现在不信了。好吧。假定你说的是对的，你会建议我怎么做？
